### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE students (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    class_id INT,
    grade INT,
    feedback TEXT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE students SET grade = 90 WHERE student_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE students (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  grade DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE grades (
  grade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  subject VARCHAR(50),
  score DECIMAL,
  feedback TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE students SET grade = 90 WHERE id = 1
